name: Micro World
description:
A game where you get to grow and transform your world by allowing small things (micro things!) to fall into it!

The only controls are the left, right, up and down arrows. There is an opening of the force field/paddle that protects the planet and you must make sure to allow things to fall through the barrier to allow the planet to grow, or the planet will lose life.

Good luck!

--Made from Trijam 122: Micro things and transformation!
